AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02.synopsis: Vignette: The two of them are giggling and talking about which Fist is hotter from the nearby patrol that frequently passes by.

Citizen_02.synopsis: Vignette: Swooning for the Fists one-liners

Citizen_01.synopsis: Vignette: Swooning for the Fists one-liners

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_0.speaker: Fast Neddio
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_0.text: I'm telling you, that Flaming Fist was winking at me.
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_0.context: NodeContext: Playful, staking a claim on someone their friend also fancies

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_2.speaker: Theda Grosz
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_2.text: Well she nodded at me. Very suggestively, I might add.
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_2.context: NodeContext: Playful, staking a claim on someone their friend also fancies

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_1.speaker: Fast Neddio
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_1.text: A suggestive nod? You've been single too long.
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_1.context: NodeContext: Giggling, thinks this is a ridiculous idea

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_6.speaker: Fast Neddio
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_6.text: If you had to pick one for a night of passion?
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_6.context: NodeContext: Like this is a really hard question

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_5.speaker: Theda Grosz
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_5.text: The one with that dink in his chest plate. I'd give him a few more of those, if you catch my drift.

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_3.speaker: Fast Neddio
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_3.text: Hard not to. I'm standing downwind.

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_8.speaker: Theda Grosz
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_8.text: What about the tall one? He's a bit of all right.
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_8.context: NodeContext: Yondalla is the god who created the halflings

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_4.speaker: Fast Neddio
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_4.text: Ugh. Not my type. He's not been near a razor in months.
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_4.context: NodeContext: grossed out at the thought

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_7.speaker: Theda Grosz
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_7.text: Neither have I. I'm exactly as Yondalla made me. Never felt so liberated.
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_7.context: NodeContext: Implying she doesn't shave anywhere.

Citizen_02_0.speaker: Theda Grosz
Citizen_02_0.text: Stop crowding me. I'll miss the patrol.

Citizen_02_1.speaker: Theda Grosz
Citizen_02_1.text: Budge off. You're blocking my view.

Citizen_01_0.speaker: Fast Neddio
Citizen_01_0.text: I can't resist a man in unform. Or anyone else, for that matter.
Citizen_01_0.context: NodeContext: With a sigh, slightly dramatic

Citizen_01_1.speaker: Fast Neddio
Citizen_01_1.text: Nothing wrong with looking, is there? A man can dream...
Citizen_01_1.context: NodeContext: With a sigh, slightly dramatic
